Name: Alysaar Forge
Description:
Provide weapons, shields and armor upgrades for Alysaar combat units.

Allow:
- Enable Explorer warp Alysaar Cannon.

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Upgrades the armor of Protoss ground units.
Root.Name: Upgrade Ground Armor Level 1

Root.Tooltip: Further upgrades the armor of Protoss ground units.
Root.Name: Upgrade Ground Armor Level 2

Root.Tooltip: Maximizes the armor of Protoss ground units.
Root.Name: Upgrade Ground Armor Level 3

Root.Tooltip: Upgrades the shields of all Protoss units and structures.
Root.Name: Upgrade Shields Level 1

Root.Tooltip: Further upgrades the shields of all Protoss units and structures.
Root.Name: Upgrade Shields Level 2

Root.Tooltip: Maximizes the shields of all Protoss units and structures.
Root.Name: Upgrade Shields Level 3

Behaviors.Tooltip: This structure's production speed is increased by -99%.
Behaviors.Name: Chrono Field
